title: Best of The Herd: 03/18/2019
itunes:title: Best of The Herd: 03/18/2019
description:
After a story came out that Ben Roethlisberger intentionally fumbled once because he didn't like the play calling, Colin is questioning Big Ben’s leadership.  He says Russell Westbrook is just too tightly wound to win in this league.  He talks about where he was right and wrong over the weekend.  Plus, former NFL WR TJ Houshmandzadeh comes in studio to talk Big Ben and OBJ.  Presented by Perky Jerky.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
